name: Maria brosse
body:
Maria Brosse & Co.

> _Maria always dreamed to become a plumber. Help her and her friends to realize this dream by finding your way in the pipe labyrinth to end levels with the shortest time !_ ## Presentation This game was developed for the young partially-sighted persons form **L'école du chateau (Nice, France)** and the institute **Clément Ader (Nice, France)**. It was developed by three students from the french engineering school **Polytech Nice-Sophia** in 2014 :
  • Bénédicte Lagouge
  • Maxime Multari
  • Camille Boinaud
